hero.title: Unreal Engine & Unity Plugin Developer
hero.subtitle: Game Engine Plugins and Mobile Development Expert
hero.description: I specialize in professional plugin development for Unreal Engine and Unity, performance optimization, and developer tools. I create solutions that optimize game developers' workflows.

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Professional plugin development services for Unreal Engine and Unity

unreal.title: Unreal Engine Plugin
unreal.description: C++ and Blueprint-based plugin development for Unreal Engine. Editor tools, runtime systems, and performance optimizations.

unity.title: Unity Plugin
unity.description: C#-based Editor extensions and runtime plugins for Unity. Custom Inspectors, Editor Windows, and workflow improvements.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile app development with SwiftUI and React Native. AI-powered features and modern user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello! I'm **Muzaffer Karafil**. I combine the discipline and precision from manufacturing with a passion for technology.
about.p2: I work in the **Paint Maintenance** team at Togg, and at the same time, I develop the **Meetly** project as a mobile and AI-focused product developer.
about.p3: I specialize in professional plugin development for **Unreal Engine** and **Unity**. Creating custom solutions for game engines, optimizing developers' workflows, and developing performant tools is my passion.
about.p4: Every plugin comes with modular architecture, performance-oriented design, and developer-friendly documentation. Cross-platform support and version control-friendly structure guarantee the success of your projects.

projects.subtitle: Unreal Engine, Unity, and mobile development projects
